results.content: For what the course is about, I learned enough new content and feel confident about using Netlify for my projects.

results.content: Great experience and support so far. Thank you!

results.content: Thank you for covering the service. This course sped through a number of topics and could use a little more detail into what each thing is and perhaps a real world example of using it. Also, if you are going to talk about services that are paid for, please pay for them so I can see you using them instead of reading the published documentation only.

response.content: Thank you McKinney. As you said this course covers number of topics(literary speaking every bits and pieces of Netlify) Please join our QA forum, I would like to discuss practical problems there. Keep in touch..
